Essentials.​Workflows.​foreach

This is a abstract workflow, meaning you define the work in the data, and you can use this to run the same workflow one by one for each item in the list. Use `wfdata.items` to access the remaining items in interpolation.

Parameters
.wfdata.items

the list of items to iterate

.wfdata.work

what to do

Notes

iterate over the list of items to repeat the specified work use wfdata.items to access the remaining items

Examples
---
rules:
  - when:
      ...
    do:
      content: foreach
      data:
        items:
          - apple
          - orange
          - strawberry
        work:
          content: notify
          data:
            notify:
              - "#my_channel"
            message:
              text: I like {{ `{{ .wfdata.items | first }}` }}.
